item.title: VKify Website — Landing Page for Browser Extension
item.description: Development of a modern landing page for the VKify browser extension — from a creative homepage to onboarding and changelog service pages.

item.title: VKify — Extension for VKontakte
item.description: VKify is a browser extension that makes VKontakte more convenient: ad blocking, interface customization, privacy mode, and much more.

item.title: CodeSqueeze — Online Code Minifier
item.description: CodeSqueeze is a modern web tool for minifying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focused on speed, privacy, and a comfortable in-browser workflow.

item.title: Landing Page ProStavki
item.description: Landing Page development for a sports analytics project, including Google Sheets integration and unique visual style.

item.title: Social media design PBPack
item.description: Developed visual identity for PBPack’s social media brand, including YouTube and Telegram.
